rows.label: qst650511_msg0001
rows.name: Here we are - this is Masrah Spring!

rows.label: qst650511_msg0002
rows.name:
A mysterious-looking place, isn't
it... It reminds me of Noctilum.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0003
rows.name:
Noctilum, eh? Is that
where you're from, Elma?

rows.label: qst650511_msg0004
rows.name:
No, not remotely. The place I come
from is very different still.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0005
rows.name:
Noctilum is a region of the planet
Mira. I lived among the humans whose
ship, the White Whale, landed on Mira.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0006
rows.name:
Tora not really understand "planet"...
But "White Whale" is like big-huge
fish-shape Divine Beast ship?

rows.label: qst650511_msg0007
rows.name:
No, it's quite different from a Divine
Beast... The name is a reference to
something in an old human book.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0008
rows.name: Anyway, Mira isn't my real home...

rows.label: qst650511_msg0009
rows.name:
But me and my comrades are
working hard to make it a
fitting second home for mankind.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0010
rows.name:
Though you speak of another world,
the story is a familiar one. Mankind
finds a way to strive and overcome.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0011
rows.name:
It sure sounds like it. And
Noctilum didn't exactly
welcome us with open arms.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0012
rows.name:
Its enormous trees and indigenous
wildlife push back against us,
every step of the way...

rows.label: qst650511_msg0013
rows.name:
But it's unavoidable, if
we're to make ourselves part
of the Miran ecosystem.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0014
rows.name:
Sounds like a right
faff if you ask me...

rows.label: qst650511_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah, but I feel like I get it.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0016
rows.name:
It's not like we haven't had to kill
some living creatures, or run away
from some monsters from time to time.

rows.label: qst650511_msg0017
rows.name:
It's all just part and
parcel of living in a world
as rich as Alst, right?

rows.label: qst650511_msg0018
rows.name:
Exactly. People have to exist inside
the world that surrounds them...

rows.label: qst650511_msg0019
rows.name:
Well, enough talk for now. Let's
do the neighborly thing and
introduce ourselves to this area.
